trans-unit.source: Contains arguments associated with changes to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref>.

Attached events supported by this delegate include are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> class, and include <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), and <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputDevice"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> as initial values for the class.
The input device associated with this event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object associated with this event.
Gets control text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
A string containing any control text associated with this event.
Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> and then invokes it.

For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
The target to call the handler on.
Gets system text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
A string containing any system text associated with this event.
Gets input text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
A string containing the input text associated with this event.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object containing the text composition associated with this event.
